data.name: SharePoint Saturday New York City 2020
data.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.

relatedRecords.name: Future Developer Summit 2019
relatedRecords.description: An invite-only, Director-level network where the developer marketing leaders debate best practices, learn and design better developer strategies. The event brings together 60 Director/VP/GM-level thought leaders in developer marketing to share experiences.

relatedRecords.description: DeveloperWeek New York is the East Coast’s largest developer & software engineering event with 3,000+ developers, engineers, architects, dev managers, IT professionals and tech execs.
